## ITextEmbeddable.renderTextEmbed() method

Renders the object for embedding in text.

**Signature:**

```typescript
renderTextEmbed(ctx: RenderContext): TextEmbedView;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ctx | [RenderContext](./bge-core.rendercontext.md) | Information about the visibility of the object, and who's viewing it. |

**Returns:**

[TextEmbedView](./bge-core.textembedview.md)
